programme.title: The Convent
programme.desc: A group of college students breaks into an abandoned convent, only to discover that it's inhabited by demons.

programme.title: Piranha
programme.desc: When flesh-eating piranhas are accidentally released into a resort's rivers, the guests become their next meal.

programme.title: Grizzly
programme.desc: An 18-foot killer grizzly terrorizes a state park, leaving it up to a park ranger to stop the slaughter.

programme.title: Amityville: A New Generation
programme.desc: A photographer is given an old mirror and demonic forces project a grisly fate upon the mirror's surface.

programme.title: Amityville: The Evil Escapes
programme.desc: The demonic forces that were lurking in Amityville escape to California by inhabiting a lamp.

programme.title: Amityville: It's About Time
programme.desc: A widowed father brings an evil antique clock home from a business trip for his teenage kids.

programme.title: Amityville: Dollhouse
programme.desc: A girl unwittingly releases evil spirits lurking within her toy house, which wreak havoc upon her family.

programme.title: Better Watch Out
programme.desc: While babysitting at Christmas, Ashley is forced to defend herself and the child against unwelcome intruders.

programme.title: Day of the Dead 2: Contagium
programme.desc: In 1968, in the Ravenside Military Hospital in a military facility in Pennsylvania, the army loses control of an experiment of a lethal bacteriologic weapon that changes the DNA and transforms human beings into zombies.

programme.title: Nightbreed
programme.desc: Boone may be a troubled young man, but his troubles are just beginning.

programme.title: Fright
programme.desc: A babysitter is terrorized by the child's father who's recently escaped from a nearby psychiatric institution.

programme.title: The Invitation
programme.desc: In this taut psychological thriller by Karyn Kusama, the tension is palpable when Will shows up to his ex-wife Eden and new husband David's dinner party.

programme.title: Creepshow 3
programme.desc: This second sequel to Creepshow features five new tales of horror.

programme.title: Mortuary
programme.desc: Christie's nightmares grow worse after her father drowns, revealing a sinister truth tied to the mortuary.
